step_data.goal: Get detailed information about the "Power of Positivity" Eye Shadow Palette.

				[1994] strong ''
					StaticText 'Customer Reviews'
				[2005] list ''
					[2006] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Pick me up makeup'
						[2008] LayoutTable ''
							[2009] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2010] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'I love that this palette is called the power of positivity. The color "Powerful" is my favorite. Interesting mix of colors. Definitely some natural and smokey eye vibes going on. Four are shimmery while the rest are solid. I really love this palette. 5 out of 5 stars. Highly recommended.'
						[2021] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2023] strong ''
								StaticText 'Gerik Alexander Gentry'
						[2024] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2026] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2027] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Really Good Pep Talks'
						[2029] LayoutTable ''
							[2030] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2031] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '80%'
						StaticText 'Gives a boost of positive to your day ... literally.I found that any time I add this to my make up routine, it just makes me feel a bit prettier in a fun way.Talc Free was a big plus.Love the way it looks combined with my routine make upDouble whammy of pretty.'
						[2042] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2044] strong ''
								StaticText '4 Lil Lambs'
						[2045] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2047] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2048] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Beautiful and pigmented'
						[2050] LayoutTable ''
							[2051] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2052] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '80%'
						StaticText 'I love this palette! The colors are so beautiful and pigmented! They can be used for a more neutral look or even glammed up with the metallics. The also blend really easily and last all day. Another plus is there is not a lot of fall out when applying.The are also eco friendly and talc free.I love the messages that are included. So much positivity!I would buy again and recommend!'
						[2063] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2065] strong ''
								StaticText 'Jordyn'
						[2066] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2068] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2069] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Cool tone eyeshadow palette'
						[2071] LayoutTable ''
							[2072] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2073] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '80%'
						StaticText "This pallet is medium size with decent sized pods of each color. 5 are matte, 3 are shimmery and the top right is matte with micro glitter.I used just a little of the one with micro glitter to give a smoky effect, then the shimmer on the insides of my lids and the gold shimmer above my lids. I added a mixture of two of the matte colors in the center and it turned out really nice.They are well pigmented, blend out well and don't leave a lot of fall out on my face."
						[2084] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2086] strong ''
								StaticText 'Artskee FartskeeArtskee Fartskee'
						[2087] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2089] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2090] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Very pigmented and easy to blend'
						[2092] LayoutTable ''
							[2093] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2094] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '80%'
						StaticText 'This small size eyeshadow palette includes 9 shades and nice combo and of matte and shimmery-glittery shares. The texture is powdery so you definitely need to tap your brush before applying it on you eyelid to get rid of the excess powder. They are very pigmented and easy to blend specially if you have nice eyeshadow base so they stay all day long very well. I really like the colors but wish the shimmer shades didn’t have so much glitters as they drop all over your face after a while.'
						[2105] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2107] strong ''
								StaticText 'Ayda D'
						[2108] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2110] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2111] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Wearable Colors - Day to Night Palette - NO TALC'
						[2113] LayoutTable ''
							[2114] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2115] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText "'Power of Positivity' Eye Shadow Palette | Gluten Free | Vegan | Cruelty FreeI am in LOVE with this palette - it reminds me of my two favorite MAC palettes (Goal Digger & Basic Btch) blended together in an easy-to-use layout. There are 5 matte shades along with 4 shimmer shades. The color payoff is excellent and easily buildable.The pans are 1 inch in diameter and are laid out perfectly. The mattes are around the left side and bottom with the shimmer shades in the upper right corner so you won't end up with micro glitter in your mattes. You can also use these wet for better color payoff. The shade Powerful is just super dramatic in a dark gray/black with blue micro glitter."
						[2126] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2128] strong ''
								StaticText 'MJ'
						[2129] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2131] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2132] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Beautiful palette with a great message!'
						[2134] LayoutTable ''
							[2135] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2136] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '80%'
						StaticText 'This comes nicely bubble wrapped, so it’s protected. It’s sealed in plastic wrapping and it’s actually in a small bubble wrap bag inside the sealed plastic wrapping! I had never seen an eyeshadow packaged that way before! I’d seen palettes in the bubble wrap type baggies but you remove it from the baggie and then then the palette is sealed in plastic wrapping. So to have this in a bubble wrap baggie sealed inside the plastic wrapping was different, but I don’t mind it! Any extra protection for an eyeshadow palette is great with me!Honey Bee Gardens is a natural cosmetics and skin care brand. They are “truly clean, fun, and affordable natural cosmetics and body care.” They are certified gluten free, vegan, and cruelty free.The palette has a cardboard sleeve. The front and back are the same design as the palette itself. The ingredients are listed on the back. They are talc-free, vegan, and cruelty free (leaping bunny certified). They are designed in the US and made in the PRC.The palette is cardboard. It has magnetic closure. There is no mirror. The pan sizes are bigger than I expected with a 9 pan palette. The shade names are below each pan. I LOVE the shade names - “Thoughtful,” “Resilient,” “Powerful,” “Worthy,” “Inspirational,” “Genuine,” “Kind,” “Successful,” and “Intelligent.” You don’t see such inspirational shade names very often! Also, on the inside lid of the palette are words - “You are loved.” “You are worthy.” “You are special.” You are beautiful.” “You are unique.” “You are strong.” “You are kind.” I LOVE that! This is a great palette to give to a young person just starting in makeup. I know sometimes when our children get old enough to start wanting to wear makeup, a lot of us will hold them off as long as possible. When the time comes, it can still be scary. We want them to be able to have fun with makeup and play around, but we also still want them to know they are beautiful with or without makeup. That makeup doesn’t make them beautiful. So, I think this would be a great palette to give to someone starting off. It would constantly remind them of all these positive attributes! Of course, that goes for adults too! ????I was checking out the company after I was so impressed by the shade names and affirmations on the inside lid. I found a post they had for this palette and it said, “Affirmations are a self-help strategy used to promote self-confidence and belief in your own abilities. These simple statements help shift your focus away from perceived failures or inadequacies and direct your focus toward strengths - those you already have and those you want to develop. Creating a mental image of yourself doing something - like acing a nerve-wracking interview or conquering your fear of heights by bungee jumping - activates many of the same brain areas that actually experiencing these situations would. So go ahead. Practice positive affirmations. Repeat them. And live your best life. Regular repetition of affirming statements about yourself can encourage your brain to take these positive affirmations as fact. When you truly believe you can do something, your actions follow.” I love that! That’s such a great message! With all the hate in the world having something so positive is great! Having a company that focuses on that is amazing!There are 5 mattes, 1 matte with micro glitter, and 3 shimmers. The mattes looked pretty muted in the pan. I’m fair skinned so I don’t mind lighter shades, but I do like a mid tone and deeper shade to help deepen things and give some depth. I like that there’s a pretty even ratio of mattes to shimmers. I love thee cool tones in the palette.I did finger swatches on my clean forearm (no lotion, primer, etc.). Mattes are 2 swipes, matte with micro glitter is 3 swipes, shimmers are 1 swipe.The mattes are all soft and smooth. They apply and blend easily. There is kickback in the pan but no fallout on the face!There is a matte with micro glitter in it (“Powerful”). It’s pretty but I’d rather it be one or the other - shimmer or matte - not try to mix the two. With micro glitter in a matte, you either apply it like a matte and when you go to blend the micro glitter falls out, sometimes all over your face, or, you pack it on to keep the shimmer. In this one there’s a ton of micro glitter, so some stays even when you blend it. It’s pretty but definitely not my choice for a shade.The shimmers are beautiful. They’re thicker so easy to pick up with a brush or your finger. They have a beautiful wet, metallic look to them.Overall I think this is a beautiful palette that works well and has a great message behind it! I definitely recommend!'
						[2147] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2149] strong ''
								StaticText 'OneWhisperOneWhisper'
						[2150] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2152] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2153] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Super WET looking metallics!!!'
						[2155] LayoutTable ''
							[2156] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2157] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText "I’m dying over these wet looking metallics, they are perfection! First of all, the color story of this 'Power of Positivity' Eye Shadow Palette is right up my alley. I love cool toned shadows, especially taupe shades. I’m glad they are making a comeback. My favorite shade in the palette is of course the center shade “Inspirational”. It’s a beautiful purplely taupe metallic shadow that just looks so wet and reflective. All the shadows in this palette are great, they really nailed the formulas. Even though this is just a 9 pan palette, each shade was so thoughtfully picked and there isn’t any redundancy. So I can create a lot of different looks from this small palette. I also don’t have to reach for another palette to complete my look, because this one has a lot of depth. I’m absolutely blown away by this little palette. The pictures don’t do it justice at all. This is a quality palette from the formulas, to the color story, to the message behind the palette. 10 out of 10! My perfect everyday palette!"
						[2168] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2170] strong ''
								StaticText 'JamJam'
						[2171] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2173] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2174] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Perfect blending'
						[2176] LayoutTable ''
							[2177] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2178] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'Great eye shadow starter kit for my teenager who has sensitive skin. Eye shadow blends perfectly and has great color intensity. The colors were accurate to what was displayed in the Amazon picture . My teen loves it! Great value for the money. She wore this make up to her homecoming dance and it was still in place when she returned home.'
						[2189] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2191] strong ''
								StaticText 'Heidi Maxwell'
						[2192] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2194] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[2195] listitem ''
						StaticText 'LOVE HONEYBEE'
						[2197] LayoutTable ''
							[2198] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2199] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'I discovered this eco-friendly line of cosmetics on Amazon while searching for product that is GF. All of the earth-friendly and animal protective measures increase my satisfaction with their make-up, but it is a TOP NOTCH make-up, too! Zero allergic reactions, prettiest color palettes for the Nana Class customer, feels great on my skin and eyes. Even the packaging is paying attention to best practices caring for our homeward. ENJOY!'
						[2210] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2212] strong ''
								StaticText 'C Bismuth'
						[2213] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
